text: Hubert Benjamin Hughes (15 October 1933 â€“ 7 May 2021) was an Anguillian politician. He was the island territory's Chief Minister from 16 March 1994 to 6 March 2000, and again between February 2010 and April 2015. Hughes died on 7 May 2021, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chief Ministers of Anguilla
